entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:39 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
